overview:
Ryan is an entrepreneur in digital media, publishing, and conferences.

Ryan runs day to day operations at Bisnow Media, a digital media company with 65 employees publishing 27 daily, B to B, e-newsletters in Atlanta, Baltimore, Boston, Charlotte, Chicago, DC, Dallas, Houston, LA, NYC, Seattle, South Florida, and Toronto. Bisnow also produces over 275 annual breakfast panel events. Bisnow’s e-newsletters are designed to be snappy, fun, yet informative news covering local, niche business markets, including commercial real estate, legal, federal technology, and trade association / non-profit.

Ryan is also a co-founder of Summit, an organization that brings together the top, young company founders, actors, actresses, social entrepreneurs, authors, and other young influencers for festivals, in which attendees experience discussion sessions, music, yoga, sky diving, white water kayaking, and much more. Summit has been featured in The New York Times, CNN, Forbes, The Washington Post, Vogue, GQ, Entrepreneur, Inc, and many other media outlets.

Prior to becoming an entrepreneur, Ryan worked as an investment banker at Deutsche Bank and subsequently as an acquisitions specialist for The Carlyle Group.
